property.name: startField
property.label: Start time field name
property.description: This needs to be a datetime field on the object that indicates the event start time

property.name: endField
property.label: End time field name
property.description: This needs to be a datetime field on the object that indicates the event end time

property.name: colorField
property.label: Color field
property.description: Any valid CSS value can go here

property.name: allDayField
property.label: All day event field
property.description: Field that specifies if the event is an all day event

property.name: additionalFilter
property.label: Additional Filter
property.description: starts with AND or OR - end of SOQL statement

property.name: aspectRatio
property.label: Calendar Aspect Ratio
property.description: higher values makes the calendar shorter vertically

property.name: height
property.label: Height of Calendar
property.description: height of calendar in pixels. unset = automatic
